title: There There - complex reaction to his situation

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Orange uses literary elements and techniques to convey Orvil’s complex reaction to his situation.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Orange uses literary elements and techniques to convey Orvil’s complex reaction to his situation.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
